Mobile App Development London

We’ve been designing and building seamless mobile apps, APIs and websites for over 10 years. We work with businesses who are looking to either create their first app, or transform their existing technology to meet their business goals. Our apps are designed with a full user-research process, and are built to scale with the growth of your business.

PHE Active 10

Walking app designed to track your everyday walks and show you how to increase your intensity to benefit your health. We developed the app for scalability and security with the University of Sheffield, and continued to support the growth to half a million users.

See morearrow_right

How a Car Works

Car mechanics manual and complete 14 hour video course. We designed and developed the iOS and Android mobile apps, increasing the rating from 3.5 to 5 stars.

See morearrow_right

Etcetera Design

User experience, branding and web design consultancy based in Hackney, London. Octave developed Etcetera’s website working closely with Stephanie to bring her designs to life with responsiveness and animation.

See morearrow_right
